skills.title: Self-Repairing System
skills.description: Increases your Maximum Health and Health Regeneration.

skills.title: Sic 'Em
skills.description: Increases Attack Command Damage and reduces its Cooldown.

skills.title: Furious Attack
skills.description: Shooting an enemy stacks Gun Damage, Pet Damage, and Handling for a short time. Max Stacks: 10 Stack Duration: 4s

skills.title: Eager to Impress
skills.description: Killing an enemy reduces your Skill Cooldown. When your pet gets a kill your Attack Command Cooldown is reset and your Skill Cooldown is reduced even more.

skills.title: All My BFF's
skills.description: You share a Health Regeneration portion with the Team. Your pets share double the Health Regeneration.

skills.title: Overclocked
skills.description: Increases your Fire Rate. Reloading doubles this bonus for a short time. Duration: 4s

skills.title: Lick the Wounds
skills.description: Your Pet gets the ability to revive you. If it does, your pet gains increased Damage for a long time. Pet Damage: +30% Duration: 60s

skills.title: Turn Tail and Run
skills.description: While moving, you gain Health Regeneration and Damage Resistance. While still, you gain Gun Damage and Fire Rate.

skills.title: The Fast and the Furryous
skills.description: While above 50% Health, you gain increased Gun Damage, Pet Damage, and Movement Speed.

skills.title: Hidden Machine
skills.description: You deal increased Damage to enemies who aren't targeting you.

skills.title: Rage and Recover
skills.description: Killing an enemy grants you and your pet Health Regeneration for a short time. Duration: 3s

skills.title: The Power Inside
skills.description: Activating an Action Skill, increases your and your pet's Damage for a short time. If you are at full health this bonus is doubled. Damage: +25% Duration: 15s

skills.title: Ferocity
skills.description: Increases your Pet Damage.

skills.title: Persistence Hunter
skills.description: Increases your Gun Damage and Action Skill Duration.

skills.title: Go for the Eyes!
skills.description: Your pet's 1st Melee Attack to an enemy is always a Critical Hit, dealing increased damage.

skills.title: Who Rescued Who?
skills.description: Dealing Damage heals your Pet for a portion of the damage. When your Pet deals damage, you gain Health Regeneration for a short time. When your pet deals damage early the duration resets. Duration: 5s

skills.title: He Bites!
skills.description: Your pet reflects some of the damage it takes to attackers.

skills.title: Frenzy
skills.description: When your pet deals damage, you stack Damage dealt. Stacks decay if your pet didn't deal damage for a short time. Max Stacks: 10 Decay Delay: 3s Loader pets are unsupported!

skills.title: Psycho Head on a Stick
skills.description: Killing an enemy increases your pet's Movement Speed and Damage for a short time. Duration: 8s

skills.title: Hive Mind
skills.description: You deflect some damage you taken to your pet. When you take damage your pet deals Bonus Damage for a short time.

skills.title: Barbaric Yawp
skills.description: Increases the Effect of your Pet Bonuses. Loader pets are unaffected!

skills.title: Mutated Defenses
skills.description: When your pet drops below 30% Health, it gains Damage Resistance and Health Regeneration for a short time. Duration: 6s Cooldown: 15s Damage Resistance: +30% Pet Max-Health Regen/s: +6.7%

skills.title: Pack Tactics
skills.description: Increases your Maximum Health, Pet Health, Pet Damage, and Damage dealt.

skills.title: Shared Spirit
skills.description: While below 30% Health, you gain increased Damage Resistance and your pet heals for half of your damage taken. Damage Resistance: +50% Pet Healing: 50% of your damage taken

skills.title: Dominance
skills.description: Scoring a Critical hit while aiming or meleeing an enemy establishes Dominance and turns the target into an ally for a short time. You can only dominate one enemy at a time and only once. The target loses 2% Max-Health/s and is more likely to be attacked. When the duration ends or the target dies, they release a Nova, dealing Radiation Area Skill Damage. Duration: 12s Beast Duration: 24s

skills.title: Interplanetary Stalker
skills.description: Killing an enemy grants you stacking Pet Damage and Damage dealt for a short time. Each enemy type you kill grants a unique stacking Bonus. Your Pet benefits from all bonuses. Individual Max Stacks: 3 Individual Stack Duration: 8s

skills.title: Leave No Trace
skills.description: When you or your Pet score a Critical Hit, you have a chance to add 1 ammo to your magazine. This has a short Cooldown. Cooldown: 0.3s

skills.title: Second Intention
skills.description: Killing an enemy increases your and your pet's Reload Speed for a short time. Critical Kills double this bonus. Duration: 5s

skills.title: Hunter's Eye
skills.description: You get different Bonuses when fighting different enemy types.

skills.title: Head Count
skills.description: Scoring a Critical Hit, has a chance to reduce your Skill Cooldown. Skill Cooldown: -2.0s

skills.title: Ambush Predator
skills.description: While no enemies are nearby, you gain increased Critical Damage and Weapon Handling.

skills.title: Two F4ng
skills.description: Every shot has a chance to fire an Extra Projectile.

skills.title: Big Game
skills.description: Increases the Effect and Duration of your Hunter (Kill) Skill Bonuses.

skills.title: The Most Dangerous Game
skills.description: Killing an Badass or stronger enemy, increases your and your pet's Weapon Handling, Gun, Pet, and Critical Damage for a long time. You also receive a Cash Reward. Duration: 120s

skills.title: Galactic Shadow
skills.description: Increases your Critical Damage and enemies are less likely to attack you. Crit Damage: +15%

skills.title: Grim Harvest
skills.description: Increases your Gun, Skill, and Pet Damage.

skills.title: Megavore
skills.description: All your shots have a chance to be a Critical Hit. Crit Chance: 20%

skills.title: Gotta Go Fast
skills.description: Increases your Pet's Damage and Movement Speed.

skills.title: Success Imminent
skills.description: When your or your pet's Shield breaks or fills up, both of you create a Nova, dealing Radiation Area Skill Damage. Cooldown: 3s

skills.title: Agility Training
skills.description: Increases your and your pet's Reload Speed.

skills.title: Better Toys
skills.description: Improves your and your pet's Shield Recharge Rate and Delay.

skills.title: Combat Veterinarian
skills.description: Shooting your pet's attack target, heals your pet for 30% of your damage dealt.

skills.title: Throatripper
skills.description: Your Pet gets a Chance to score Critical Hits.

skills.title: Lethal Force Authorized
skills.description: Reduces your Pet's Respawn Time. When your Loader Pet would enter Fight For Your Life, it instead turns into an EXP Loader. The EXP Loader charges at an enemy and self-destructs, dealing Fire Area Pet Damage in a large radius. Pet Respawn Time: -33.3%

skills.title: Take This!
skills.description: Your pet gains a copy of your Shield with its Effects.

skills.title: Monkey Do!
skills.description: Increases your pet's Critical Damage. When your pet scores a Critical Hit, your next shot is converted to Physical Amp Damage. Amp Damage: +86%

skills.title: Wooly Armor
skills.description: While your Shield is full, your pet gains Damage Resistance. Pet Damage Resistance: +75%

skills.title: Not Even a Challenge
skills.description: When your pet gets a kill, you gain stacking Action Skill Duration and Cooldown Rate for a short time. Max Stacks: 10 Stack Duration: 12s

skills.title: Fuzzy Math
skills.description: When you or your pet scores a Critical Hit, you two restore a Shield portion.

skills.title: Keep Them Safe
skills.description: Issuing an Attack Command while you or your pet is below 50% Shield, causes you two to restore a Shield portion. Cooldown: 12s

skills.title: Capacitance
skills.description: Activating your Action Skill, starts your Shield Recharge and doubles your Current Shield for a short time. Duration: 16s Cooldown: 16s
